text:
The report titled Passenger Information System Market – APAC Outlook (2015-19) showcases an in-depth analysis of the market in terms of market size, segmentation by regions, by components and by transportation. This report also forecasts the growth numbers till 2019 (on a YoY basis) and hence suggests the Compound Annual Growth Rate (CAGR) for the estimated period.
Passenger Information System Market Overview
Passenger Information System (PIS) market is an emerging device segment which is grabbing attention all over the globe. Growing need for real time access of passenger information is enabling the implementation of these systems. However, the usability of PIS is limited to and largely dependent on the infrastructure present in the respective geographies.
PIS Market in APAC Driven By Demand for Sophisticated Public Transportation System
Passenger Information System has gradually evolved over the years in APAC region. The immensely populated countries in APAC like India and China will witness greater need for public transportation systems thereby driving the growth of PIS in the region.
The transit information delivery channel has changed from traditional display systems to digital technologies with the advent of mobility. Mobility and growing information accessibility has compelled the transit agencies to increase investments in PIS. The e-ticketing service has become highly popular in the region with emergence of mobile and online ticketing applications.
The investments in airline transportation is also increasing with the increased preferences of people to use airlines to commute between major cities in the region. Apart from airlines, road and rail transportation infrastructure in emerging regions are improving on a yearly basis which provides scope for efficient public transport. The growth in population, mobility and investments in public infrastructure will drive the growth of passenger information systems in APAC region.
Market Segments and Forecasts Covered in the Report
The Passenger Information System Market APAC Outlook is segmented by:
- Component (Multimedia Devices, Public Announcement Devices, Network and Communications, Sensors, Others)
